
# Spotify DBUS Control

## CLI Reference

```text
spotify-dbus <flag>

Flags:
 --next            Go to the next song
 --prev            Go to the previous song
 --toggle          Play or pause the current song
 --push-back       Go back 5 seconds
 --push-forward    Go forward 5 seconds
 --stop            Just stop
```
